code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useShoppingCart}from'../contexts/ShoppingCartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const{getTotalItems}=useShoppingCart();const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const isActive=path=>{return location.pathname===path;};const handleSearch=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(searchTerm.trim()){navigate("/search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(searchTerm.trim())));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"top-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:"FOOTLILY"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"search-container",onSubmit:handleSearch,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-search search-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"search-input",placeholder:"Buscar productos...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"cart-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-cart-fill cart-icon"}),getTotalItems()>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cart-count",children:getTotalItems()})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"category-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/')?'active':''),children:"TODOS LOS PRODUCTOS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/category/boots",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/category/boots')?'active':''),children:"BOTAS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/category/sneakers",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/category/sneakers')?'active':''),children:"ZAPATILLAS"})]})]});};export default Navigation;
